mapper.select: SELECT ci.course_id FROM chapter c JOIN course_inst ci ON c.course_inst_id = ci.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT f.* FROM file f JOIN teaching_material tm ON f.id = tm.file_id JOIN chapter ch ON tm.for_chapter = ch.id WHERE ch.id = #{chapterId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM teaching_material WHERE for_chapter = (SELECT id FROM chapter WHERE id = #{chapterId})
mapper.select: SELECT ci.id AS course_inst_id, c.name, c.course_type, ci.instructor_msg, ci.year, ci.term_part, c.grade_level, c.course_cate, c.course_for, cis.name AS course_inst_name FROM course_inst ci JOIN course c ON ci.course_id = c.id JOIN teach t ON c.id = t.course_id JOIN course_inst_section cis ON cis.course_inst_id = ci.id WHERE t.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND ci.year = #{value}

SELECT ch.id AS chapter_id, ch.title, ch.title_level, f.id AS "file.id", f.url AS "file.url", f.size AS "file.size", f.hash AS "file.hash", tm.upload_time, tm.uploader_id, tm.name FROM chapter ch JOIN teaching_material tm ON tm.for_chapter = ch.id LEFT JOIN file f ON tm.file_id = f.id WHERE ch.course_inst_id = #{courseInstId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file(url, size, hash) VALUES (#{url}, #{size}, #{hash})
